same here bro. .   followed the directions throughly,  and it says expires on 4/6/11.  im on windows 7 pro x64.  but thank u for all ur time and dedication, its much appreciated.
Same for me m8 but I do thank you for all your time and effort it is appreciated :-)

IN CASE OF LICENSE PROBLEMS:
****************************
Remove the lines in the Config.ini file, and add the following lines
(should be good til march 03 2094):

[lang]
Language=English
[RunTime]
RunDate=40602.7611953819
[General]
Language=English
CheckUpdate=0
News=0
NewsID=0
Disc=3
ExpiredDate=70921.6910998958
[Global]
CurBnumber=209
[DiskCleaner]
History=1
Cookies=1
WinPatch=1
UserTmp=1
WinTmp=1
PatchSource=0
Recent=1
Shortcut=0
ScanDisk=0
StartDate=40602.7611953819
DeleteTo=
ClearMode=2
LastSearch=
[Scrubber]
ShellEx=0
[RegCleaner]
EnableUndo=1
ScanMode=0
the fix worked, good till march 2094!  you sir, are a gentleman and a scholar!  thank u bro.
